name: Hounding Hex
text:
Cost: 2 AP, 2 mana.
Make a 5d6 (high-rolling) spiritual attack against a character within range. If you succeed, the target is temporarily hexed.
If you make this attack against that character while it's still hexed, instead of rolling for damage, you may have the attack deal 2 less damage to that character than it dealt the previous time.

Increase the size of your mana pool by 1.
